recipe.title: Easy Garlic and Onion Bread Wedges
ingredients: 1 16-ounce baked cheese pizza crust (such as Boboli)
1/4 cup chopped fresh basil or 1 tablespoon dried, crumbled
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F. Brush pizza crust lightly with olive oil. Combine remaining ingredients in small bowl. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Spread mayonnaise mixture evenly over crust. Bake until crust is crisp and topping heated through, about 10 minutes.
